availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alfred Girtman (Laurel County, Kentucky, farm laborer)

body.p: Laurel County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Tennessee native. Farm laborer in Laurel County in 1860. Private in the 7th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) during the Civil War.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Laurel, Not Stated, p. 109. Find A Grave, "Alfred Girtman (c1842-c1886)," Memorial #21428630, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/21428630 (accessed June 18, 2017). Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 572.
